participant_1.background:
My black and white cat, Cow, is my most valued material possession because he is my best friend and always there for me.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I'm afraid of crashing my model airplane.
I am not close with my parents.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to learn how to defend myself.
i eat more junk food than i really should.
I'm a bit tired from working part time, but my new sneakers are helping!
I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous.
i cuddle up with my dog every night.

content.text: Hey! How are you?
Good, how are you? What are you up to today?
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
Nice! I'm a bit tired from working part time, but my new sneakers are helping!
What do you do for work?
I'm a barista at Starbucks. It's a fun job, but can be tiring sometimes.
I bet it can! What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to cuddle up with my dog, watch movies, and play video games.
Nice! I'm a big movie buff. What are some of your favorite movies?
I like all sorts of movies, but my favorites are probably action and comedy movies.
I love action movies! What are some of your favorite action movies?
Some of my favorites are The Dark Knight, Mad Max: Fury Road, and The Matrix.
Those are all great movies! I love The Dark Knight too.
It's so good! Do you have any pets?
I have a black and white cat named Cow. He's my best friend.
That's awesome! I have a dog named Milo. He's the best.
I bet he is! Dogs are so great.
Yeah, they are. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really. I might go to the gym again, or maybe watch a movie.
Sounds like a good plan. Have a great weekend!
You too!
